name: Inner Mongolia Yingjun No.1 Coal Mine
company_mentions: Inner Mongolia Weihua Mining Co., Ltd.

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E5%86%85%E8%92%99%E5%8F%A4%E9%B9%B0%E9%AA%8F%E4%B8%80%E5%8F%B7%E7%9F%BF%E4%BA%95. The Inner Mongolia Yingjun No.1 Coal Mine is located in the Ordos region and has a designed production capacity of 6 million tons per year
